post.text: Labor Day is a long-standing tradition celebrating the American worker but with millions of Americans out of work, we must do something to get America back to work. As President I will end bad trade deals and bring back American jobs for our people! #AmericaFirst!

comment.author: Collin
comment.text: but Americans don't want to work! During the 8 years of Obama giving people welfare, food stamps and fake disabilitiy claims Americans found out its more enjoyable not to work and still live a comfortable life. People don't fear losing their job like they did 20 years ago.

replies.author: Collin
replies.text: The town I live in the people not working outnumber the people with jobs. Last winter they didn't plow my street after a snowstorm and when i called to complain they told me nobody on my street works so they feel it wasn't important to plow my street cause they had no where to go and my street is low priority cause I am the only person on my street that works and they know I can afford a 4x4 vehicle.
